begin: ^Well, well, well... so you decided? There'll be so much customers waiting in line. I could use some help. I would definitely reward you according to your workload.
^Sure, but to be honest I'm rather nervous

c-0: ^Alright, let me teach you the ropes, listen carefully...
^(And so, I slowly learn to repair gadgets...)
c-1: ^As long as you focus on me, I'm sure you'll be fine.
^(And so, I slowly learn to repair gadgets...)
